comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? INPUT: if( es[--esi][ es[esi+1] ] === 1) { es[esi] = 0; } else { es[esi] = 1; } OUTPUT: es[esi] = 1 === es[--esi][es[esi + 1]] ? 0 : 1; BUT MUST BE es[--esi] = 1 === es[esi][es[esi + 1]] ? 0 : 1; Im using latest version on windows
This issue was closed by revision 5b9485903b5e.
